name: The Adventures of BoingBot Episode 1
description:
Meet BoingBot, a bouncing droid that has to battle an endless supply of ShockBots to solve puzzles.

This scrolling action arcade game with fun puzzles and riddles to solve, will engage everyone from young to old. “Episode 1: Sets our chromed hero out on a quest to save his community by solving the puzzles ! Go to a variety of settings, solve a number of problems, and try to figure out at least in part, who is behind all of this and why! Brightly colored, family friendly, easily controlled, and mentally challenging. Help BoingBot solve this mystery to engage additional episodes, coming soon!

Brightly colored, family friendly, easily controlled, and mentally challenging.

Supports 15 languages
